data.text:
Herbert Standing1

M, #183431, b. 13 November 1846, d. 5 December 1923

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Herbert Standing was born on 13 November 1846 at Peckham, London, England .1 He died on 5 December 1923 at age 77 at Los Angeles, California, U.S.A. .1

He was an actor.1

Children of Herbert Standing

Herbert Standing, Jr.1

Sir Guy Standing+1 b. 1 Sep 1873, d. 24 Feb 1937

Wyndham Standing1 b. 23 Aug 1880, d. 1 Feb 1963

Jack Standing1 b. 10 Feb 1886, d. 25 Oct 1917

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Wyndham Standing1

M, #183432, b. 23 August 1880, d. 1 February 1963

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Wyndham Standing was born on 23 August 1880 at London, England .1 He was the son of Herbert Standing.1 He died on 1 February 1963 at age 82 at Los Angeles, California, U.S.A. .1

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Jack Standing1

M, #183433, b. 10 February 1886, d. 25 October 1917

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Jack Standing was born on 10 February 1886 at London, England .1 He was the son of Herbert Standing.1 He died on 25 October 1917 at age 31 at Los Angeles, California, U.S.A. .1

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

M, #183434

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Herbert Standing, Jr. is the son of Herbert Standing.1

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt.1

M, #183435, b. 22 October 1902, d. 29 August 1964

Last Edited=4 May 2011

Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt. was born on 22 October 1902.1 He was the son of Sir George Edward Leon, 2nd Bt. and Mildred Ethel Jennings.1 He married, firstly, Rosemary Armstrong, daughter of George Armstrong, on 28 October 1924.1 He married, secondly, Dorothy Katherine Standing, daughter of Sir Guy Standing and Dorothy Hammond, on 9 November 1932.1 He and Dorothy Katherine Standing were divorced in 1945.1 He married, thirdly, Alice Mary Holt, daughter of Dr. Thomas Holt, on 23 June 1947.1 He died on 29 August 1964 at age 61.1

He was educated at Eton College, Windsor, Berkshire, England .1 He was educated at Magdalen College School, Oxford, Oxfordshire, England .1 He gained the rank of Captain in the King's Royal Rifle Corps.1 He fought in the Second World War.1 He succeeded as the 3rd Baronet Leon, of Bletchley Park, Bletchley, co. Buckingham [U.K., 1911] on 14 May 1947.1 He was admitted to London Stock Exchange.1

Child of Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt. and Rosemary Armstrong

Anne Elizabeth Leon+1 b. 8 Dec 1925

Children of Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt. and Dorothy Katherine Standing

Sir John Ronald Leon, 4th Bt.+1 b. 16 Aug 1934

Timothy Michael George Leon1 b. 31 May 1938

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2304. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

Sir John Selby Clements1

M, #183436, b. 25 April 1910, d. 6 April 1988

Last Edited=3 Feb 2006

Sir John Selby Clements was born on 25 April 1910.2 He married Dorothy Katherine Standing, daughter of Sir Guy Standing and Dorothy Hammond, in 1946.1 He died on 6 April 1988 at age 77.2

He was educated at St. Paul's School, London, England .2 He was educated at St. John's College, Cambridge University, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England .2 He was an actor and director.1 He was appointed Commander, Order of the British Empire (C.B.E.)1

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2304. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S203] Announcements, The Times, London, U.K., 8 April 1988. Hereinafter cited as The Times.

Jill Melford1

F, #183437, b. 23 November 1934

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Jill Melford was born on 23 November 1934 at London, England .2 She is the daughter of Jack Melford.1 She married Sir John Ronald Leon, 4th Bt., son of Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt. and Dorothy Katherine Standing, in 1961.1 She and Sir John Ronald Leon, 4th Bt. were divorced in 1972.1

She was an actress.1

Citations

[S37] BP2003 volume 2, page 2304. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S37]

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Sarah Kate Forbes1

F, #183439, b. 21 May 1959

Last Edited=2 Feb 2006

Sarah Kate Forbes was born on 21 May 1959.2 She is the daughter of John Theobald Clarke and Nanette Newman.1 She married Sir John Ronald Leon, 4th Bt., son of Sir Ronald George Leon, 3rd Bt. and Dorothy Katherine Standing, on 7 April 1984.1

She was contributing editor of Tatler.1

Children of Sarah Kate Forbes and Sir John Ronald Leon, 4th Bt.

Archie Leon1 b. 28 Jul 1986
